In commemoration of the International Day of the Indigenous Peoples, I announced the creation of the Cabinet of Indigenous Peoples and Interculturality.
The Indigenous Peoples Cabinet will be a body that will formulate proposals and legal reforms that will become public policies.
I am pleased to announce also the formation of a body of indigenous advisors in each of the ministries, which will guarantee ... 1/3
the vision and the intercultural approach in the tasks of government. This cabinet will have the political supervision of the vice president ... 2/3
and the President of the Republic, being our 1st. task a territorial consultation to rethink indigenous institutions. 3/3
